title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing 'Ok' after changing the project properties to use the project as both the source folder and the output location, an error message appears: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This error occurs because setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations, and setting the output location first creates an illegal state.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location. 2. In the project properties, change the settings to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location.
